D

destroy() - Method in class horsentp.simpledrawing.DrawWindow
 
DrawWindow - Class in horsentp.simpledrawing
The DrawWindow object is to be a single, unified object that can be drawn on, and report user input.
DrawWindow(String, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class horsentp.simpledrawing.DrawWindow
Creates a non-resizeable DrawWindow that can report user input and be drawn on.
